mapper.insert: insert into LY_ACTIONS_TBL (UID_ACTIVIDAD, ACTION_UID, ACTION_TYPE, MANUAL_EXECUTION, NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE, TIME_INTERVAL, CRON_INTERVAL, LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID, ACTION_DATA, TRIGGER_UID) values (#{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler}, #{nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionData,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update LY_ACTIONS_TBL
UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTION_TYPE = #{record.actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MANUAL_EXECUTION = #{record.manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler},
NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE = #{record.nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIME_INTERVAL = #{record.timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRON_INTERVAL = #{record.cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTION_DATA = #{record.actionData,jdbcType=BLOB},
TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update LY_ACTIONS_TBL set UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_TYPE = #{record.actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANUAL_EXECUTION = #{record.manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler}, NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE = #{record.nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIME_INTERVAL = #{record.timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRON_INTERVAL = #{record.cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_DATA = #{record.actionData,jdbcType=BLOB}, TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_ACTIONS_TBL set UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_TYPE = #{record.actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANUAL_EXECUTION = #{record.manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler}, NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE = #{record.nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIME_INTERVAL = #{record.timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRON_INTERVAL = #{record.cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_ACTIONS_TBL
ACTION_TYPE = #{actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MANUAL_EXECUTION = #{manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler},
NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE = #{nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIME_INTERVAL = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRON_INTERVAL = #{cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID = #{lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTION_DATA = #{actionData,jdbcType=BLOB},
TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACTION_UID = #{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_ACTIONS_TBL set ACTION_TYPE = #{actionType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANUAL_EXECUTION = #{manualExecution,jdbcType=DECIMAL,typeHandler=com.comerzzia.core.util.mybatis.typehandlers.BooleanNumberTypeHandler}, NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE = #{nextExecutionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIME_INTERVAL = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRON_INTERVAL = #{cronInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID = #{lastActionExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_DATA = #{actionData,jdbcType=BLOB}, TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACTION_UID = #{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.sql: ACTION.UID_ACTIVIDAD, ACTION.ACTION_UID, ACTION.ACTION_TYPE, ACTION.MANUAL_EXECUTION, ACTION.ACTION_DATA, ACTION.NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE, ACTION.TIME_INTERVAL, ACTION.CRON_INTERVAL, ACTION.LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID, ACTION.TRIGGER_UID, AEXEC.ACC_EXECUTION_UID, AEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, AEXEC.MANUAL_EXECUTION, AEXEC.START_DATE, AEXEC.END_DATE, AEXEC.USER_ID, AEXEC.STATUS_ID, AEXEC.STATUS_TEXT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
FROM LY_ACTIONS_TBL ACTION LEFT JOIN LY_ACTIONS_EXEC_TBL AEXEC ON (AEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = ACTION.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND AEXEC.ACC_EXECUTION_UID = ACTION.LAST_ACTION_EXEC_UID)
order by ${orderByClause}
